oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified group
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lenoir City School of Arts and Crafts, Commercial and Portrait Photography, M.L. Stanley, Proprietor. Lenoir City, Tenn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified group (probably including Robert Crye, Greenback, TN). Label on back: Lenoir City School of Arts and Crafts, Commercial and Portrait Photography, M.L. Stanley, Proprietor. Lenoir City, Tenn. 1904. Photograph was found in the attic in the home of Robert Crye (1899-1997), Nashville, TN. In 1910 He was a school teacher in Greenback, TN. Several hard to read notes on the back of the photograph (Class of Prucitt? Nicholasville, KY? Kellogg ________ & Supply Co.?).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
